tool_description: Search Indian Railway trains by either train number or it's name.
name: Railway Trains - India
title: Railway Trains - India

api_list.name: SEARCH
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trains.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trains.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trains.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trains.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
